mapper.select: SELECT I.INQUIRY_ID, I.INQUIRY_STATUS_ID, S.INQUIRY_STATUS, I.INQUIRY_TYPE_ID, T.INQUIRY_TYPE_NAME, I.MEM_ID, I.INQUIRY_TITLE, I.INQUIRY_CONTENT, DATE_FORMAT(I.INQUIRY_DATE_CREATED, '%Y-%m-%d') AS INQUIRY_DATE_CREATED, I.INQUIRY_A FROM INQUIRY I INNER JOIN INQUIRY_STATUS S ON I.INQUIRY_STATUS_ID = S.INQUIRY_STATUS_ID INNER JOIN INQUIRY_TYPE T ON I.INQUIRY_TYPE_ID = T.INQUIRY_TYPE_ID ORDER BY INQUIRY_ID LIMIT #{perPagePostCount} OFFSET #{startPostNo}

SELECT I.INQUIRY_ID, I.INQUIRY_STATUS_ID, S.INQUIRY_STATUS, I.INQUIRY_TYPE_ID, T.INQUIRY_TYPE_NAME, I.MEM_ID, I.INQUIRY_TITLE, I.INQUIRY_CONTENT, DATE_FORMAT(I.INQUIRY_DATE_CREATED, '%Y-%m-%d') AS INQUIRY_DATE_CREATED, I.INQUIRY_A FROM INQUIRY I INNER JOIN INQUIRY_STATUS S ON (I.INQUIRY_STATUS_ID = S.INQUIRY_STATUS_ID) INNER JOIN INQUIRY_TYPE T ON (I.INQUIRY_TYPE_ID = T.INQUIRY_TYPE_ID) WHERE INQUIRY_ID = #{inquiryId}

SELECT I.INQUIRY_ID, I.INQUIRY_STATUS_ID, S.INQUIRY_STATUS, I.INQUIRY_TYPE_ID, T.INQUIRY_TYPE_NAME, I.MEM_ID, I.INQUIRY_TITLE, I.INQUIRY_CONTENT, DATE_FORMAT(I.INQUIRY_DATE_CREATED, '%Y-%m-%d') AS INQUIRY_DATE_CREATED, I.INQUIRY_A FROM INQUIRY I INNER JOIN INQUIRY_STATUS S ON (I.INQUIRY_STATUS_ID = S.INQUIRY_STATUS_ID) INNER JOIN INQUIRY_TYPE T ON (I.INQUIRY_TYPE_ID = T.INQUIRY_TYPE_ID) WHERE I.INQUIRY_STATUS_ID = #{searchDTO.status} ORDER BY INQUIRY_ID LIMIT #{perPagePostCount} OFFSET #{startPostNo}

SELECT INQUIRY_ID, INQUIRY_STATUS_ID, INQUIRY_TYPE_ID, MEM_ID, INQUIRY_TITLE, INQUIRY_CONTENT, DATE_FORMAT(INQUIRY_DATE_CREATED, '%Y-%m-%d') AS INQUIRY_DATE_CREATED, INQUIRY_A FROM INQUIRY ORDER BY INQUIRY_ID LIMIT #{perPagePostCount} OFFSET #{startPostNo}
